body.name: EKEN Smart Video Doorbell 1080P Camera Wireless with Chime Ringer, Indoor/Outdoor Surveillance, Cloud Storage, AI Human Detection, 2.4G WiFi, HD Live Image, Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Battery Powered
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 18 mins
features: Crystal Clear 1080p Wide-Angle Lens: Record and view live footage with remarkable detail and precision
Advanced Night Vision Technology: intelligent IR sensor deliver sharp, high-resolution videos in low-light situations, day or night.

Safe and Encrypted Cloud Storage: Benefit from AES-128 encrypted cloud storage through an optional subscription plan (available separately), complete with a 30-day free trial for continuous recording, playback, and sharing.
Precise AI-Powered Human Recognition: Leverage cutting-edge AI technology for accurate human identification, while eliminating false triggers from cars or trees.
Real-Time Bidirectional Communication: Effortlessly engage with visitors from anywhere in real-time

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EKEN 1080p Intelligent Wireless Video Doorbell Advanced Pre-Capture Capability: For those subscribed to our Cloud Storage, this allows you to view the events leading up to the primary incident, providing a more complete view. Optimized for 2.4GHz Wi-Fi: It is tailored for 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, guaranteeing a consistent and speedy connection.
EKEN Smart Wireless Doorbell Camera - Upgrade Your Home Security Experience Features of EKEN Wireless Doorbell Camera, Battery-powered Camera

Superior Night Vision Four infrared LEDs combined with a smart IR sensor allow continuous surveillance, producing clear videos even in dimly lit conditions. Protected Cloud Storage Option Avail AES-128 encrypted cloud storage via an optional subscription (available separately). Delve into a 30-day complimentary trial, facilitating video recording, playback, and sharing.

Interactive Two-Way Talk Connect with guests in real-time, from any location, facilitating smooth interactions. Quick Alerts, receive speedy mobile notifications. Enhanced AI Human Recognition Activate the AI function to distinguish humans from other moving entities, such as vehicles and animals. All-Weather Durability With its IP65 rating, the doorbell is resilient against diverse weather conditions, ensuring consistent performance throughout the seasons. Chime Included Place the doorbell chime in your dining room, kitchen, or courtyard to hear when someone rings your doorbell.

Is the doorbell camera compatible with 5GHz Wi-Fi networks? This doorbell camera only works with 2.4G Wi-Fi. You'll need to have separate networks for 2.4GHz and 5GHz Wi-Fi. Make sure they have different names, and connect the camera to the 2.4GHz network. Why is the battery not charging? Please ensure a transparent or black insulating strip on the bottom of the battery has been removed. Consider trying a different charger to determine if it's a charger issue. Typically, it takes about 14 hours to fully charge using a 5V1A charger. How many users can view the doorbell camera at the same time? The main account can allow access to the device for 8 other accounts. While 3 users can watch the video simultaneously, only one can use the intercom at a time. Do I need to buy an SD memory card for this doorbell camera? No. This doorbell camera doesn't use SD cards; it stores videos in the cloud. What to do if the device fails to connect to the network? 1). Device supports 2.4G Wi-Fi only, please check the your network before connecting it. 2). Ensure Correct Wi-Fi and Password Entry, delete and reconnect the Wi-Fi might be helpful. 3). Please check the distance between device and Wi-Fi router.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome product at great price
reviews.reviewText: I brought this camera doorbell to see how it compared to other top brands, and I’m totally impressed with this product very clear picture speaker quality is very good I would definitely recommend this doorbell camera

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good!
reviews.reviewText: The pros - Excellent picture quality, easy to use app, and simple installation of the device. The Cons - The app is buggy when logging on from more that one device, and the battery stamina is worrisome. The battery drain may have to do with our -30 degree windchill, so the jury is still out and I will update once the weather warms up. Good value for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Bang For Your Dollar
reviews.reviewText: The cost of this little gem was so low I figured I'd give it a try. I got here and set up was simple and installation was easy. I still can't believe how well it works, for the cost. The only thing I wish it had that more expensive models have is a way to change the shape of the area of coverage. That's ok, for my application, this works just fine. Oh and web storage is dirt cheat too. I figured that that was where they were going stick it to the consumer, but very, very reasonable rates. I wish there was a higher rating than four stars just for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good product and the charge last a very long time and also the membership is super cheap for recording

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Battery dies every few days
reviews.reviewText: What a bummer. The battery dies every few days, which means most of the time the battery is dead and the doorbell and camera don't work. At least the doorbell could work if the camera died, but nope. I've missed several people at my door because they're ringing the bell but I'm unaware because the battery already died.Also, the doorbell rings OUTSIDE as well as inside and this is annoying to my neighbors.You can not view any videos that are saved unless you pay for a subscription from Awit. Which means it's only a live camera, and not a recorder unless you pay more for that service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good inexpensive camera
reviews.reviewText: For the price the product is really good and the set up is very easy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive and easy option
reviews.reviewText: I like that the doorbell was relatively inexpensive. It took a couple of tries to get everything connected but now it's working great. The video quality is excellent. The only thing I don't like is the no video playback unless you buy a subscription but overall I am satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The camera quality is great. The mic quality is poor. It's squeals a feedback even after adjusting volume on app.
